com.infinityrefactoring.reflections

Class Reflections

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.infinityrefactoring.reflections.Reflections

  • public class Reflections
extends Object
    This is an utility class for facilitates the access, of centralized way, to the principal functionalities of the "com.infinityrefactoring.reflections" package.
    Author:
    Thom√°s Sousa Silva (ThomasSousa96)
    See Also:
    ClassWrapper, PathExpression, Predicates
